department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Leather belt with 9 lozenge shaped conchas and lozenge shaped silver buckle; each concha set with single elliptical Stennich turquoise; stamped chased and repousse decoration; buckle has two turquoises; buckle and conchas strung diagonally on leather strap;  (11 stones in all). (some turquoise cracked and chipped. J.#546, Cat.#558.
title: Concha Belt
